price: 28. Traiterons-Nous ceux qui ont cru et ont accompli les bonnes œuvres tout comme les corrupteurs sur terre? Traiterons-Nous les gens pieux tout comme les dépravés ?
arabic: أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلۡفُجَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am najʿalu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kal-muf'sidīna fī al-arḍi am najʿalu al-mutaqīna kal-fujāri
